title: WT20 Challenge, Trailblazers vs Velocity as it happened: Navgire‚Äôs knock takes VEL into final
content:
Watch: Velocity vs Trailblazers match highlights
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Watch: Kiran Navgire innings highlights
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Match summary:TOSS:¬†Velocity win the toss and opt to bowl.Trailblazers 190/5 (20):¬†Half-centuries from S Meghana (73) & Jemimah Rodrigus (66) took TBL to a brilliant score, the highest so far in the brief history of the tournament.¬†Velocity reach final:¬†Needed to score 159 to qualify, Deepti Sharma‚Äôs team scored 174/9 in their 20 overs. Kiran Navgire scored a sensational 34-ball 69 on her debut innings in this event. The fastest half century too in this tournament, came off just 25 balls.¬†
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Now imagine if the Women‚Äôs IPL had happened a couple of years... maybe a Kiran Navgire could have been unearthed earlier? She is 27 now, mind you.Sophie Devine interview: ‚ÄòWhen a women‚Äôs IPL happens, I‚Äôll be scared of what‚Äôs coming from India‚Äô 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    ‚ÄúMujhe sixes maarna bahut pasand hai‚Äù: Kiran Navgire. Indeed, so! 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Kiran Navgire in action / Sportzpics 

    supernovas got a cracking bowling up and Velocity got a brilliant batting line up. can't wait for the finals, it's gonna be an epic match. #WomensT20Challenge‚Äî siddhi (@_sectumsempra18) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Player of the match: Kiran Navgire‚Äôs 69 off 34 balls, an innings we shall remember for a while.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 174/9 in their 20 overs: Trailblazers win, get knocked out. Keeping in line with the absurdity of this ‚Äútournament‚Äù. What a night of batting from both sides though. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET!  19.6: Kate Cross 6(6) ct Arundhati Reddy b Poonam Yadav Cross is out off the last ball. Trailblazers win the match but bow out of the final. Velocity 174/9
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET!  18.5: Simran Bahadur 12(10) b Hayley Matthews Simran wanted to keep going, muted celebrations for TBL, the defending champions on paper, won‚Äôt be in the final despite a good performance today. Velocity 166/8
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #WomensT20Challengeüö® Velocity reach the final. Riding on Shafali Verma and Kiran Navgire's fireworks, Velocity have made sure they will play in the final. Simran Bahadur takes them past 158 with a four.VEL: 162/7 (18.2)TBL: 190/5 (20)#VELvTBL https://t.co/uo0Sg7yA6S pic.twitter.com/cIwkWWskS0‚Äî The Field (@thefield_in) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 158/7 after 18 overs: correction in score
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    TBL need a Hayley Matthews hat-trick right now.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 158/7 after 18 overs: Just one more run needed to reach the final. Fair to say the actual target is a bit too far away now. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET!  17.2: Radha Yadav 2(4) Run Out Jemimah Rodrigues WELL, WELL! What do we have here. Superb direct hit from deep midwicket by JR. VEL still needed 4 more runs. Velocity 155/7
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Walks off to a standing ovation and a pat on the back from her non-striker...Give it up for Kiran Navgire üëè69 (34) on debut in the #My11CircleWT20C pic.twitter.com/zdsGxpGWxq‚Äî CricXtasy (@CricXtasy) May 26, 2022



    Kiran Prabhu Navgire's madness of a T20 season:162* (76)81* (38)47 (28)91* (59)31 (23)57 (36)56 (44)69 (34)594 runs at an average of 118.80 and a SR of 175.7440 sixes in 8 innings.#WT20Challenge #VELvTBL #My11CircleWT20C‚Äî hypocaust (@_hypocaust) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET!  16.4: Kiran Navgire 69(34) st Richa Ghosh b Sophia Dunkley Kiran Navgire walks back after a breathtaking 69 off 34 balls. How good was that? The win might be out of reach for them but KPN has taken them close to the final. Velocity 153/6 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    -A six off the first ball in #WT20Challenge -A 50 in her maiden innings that also happens to be the fastest 50 in tournament's history-Most sixes in an inningsKP Navgire has arrived.Imagine Navgire & Shafali Verma opening the innings together for India!#VELvTBL #Velocity‚Äî Rajneesh Gupta (@rgcricket) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET!  15.2: Sneh Rana 11(14) ct Smriti Mandhana b Renuka Singh TBL just about keeping things interesting. Rana hit a couple of fours but otherwise struggled for timing. Velocity 144/5
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 143/4 after 15 overs: A quiet over, that‚Äôs a rarity, from Sophia Dunkley. 19 runs needed for qualification, seems imminent. But will Velocity go for 191? 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Kiran's 50 and the crowd break the decibel record for the tournament #WT20Challenge pic.twitter.com/s4UPJuTYUS‚Äî Patrick Hargreaves (@PatrickHargrea2) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    The number of people who were excited to watch Kiran Navgire bat without ever seeing her bat before... and to see her deliver in such style today. Should tell BCCI something about the interest levels in the game. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    HALF CENTURY FOR KIRAN NAVGIRE: Unreal. The dugout rises, crowd applauds. Superb stuff.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #WomensT20ChallengeLadies & gentlemen, KIRAN NAVGIRE! üî•üî•üî•Six to reach a 25-ball half century. Fastest half century in the brief history of this tournament. Hits a six next ball too!VEL: 139/4 (14)TBL: 190/5 (20)#VELvTBL live blog: https://t.co/uo0Sg7yA6S pic.twitter.com/UcVRS0UdPB‚Äî The Field (@thefield_in) May 26, 2022



    Uncapped and unheralded, yet lit up the Women's T20 Challenge, in Velocity colours: 15-year-old Shafali Verma in Jaipur (2019)27-year-old Kiran Navgire in Pune (2022)The Indian women's domestic pool is deep. All that one needs to do is try to gauge it#WT20Challenge #WT20C‚Äî Annesha Ghosh (@ghosh_annesha) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 125/4 after 13 overs: Navgire is now on 47. A Couple of boundaries for Sneh Rana since she came into bat, seemingly a tough chance dropped in that over too off Poonam‚Äôs bowling. Bottom edges are not easy for keepers 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #WomensT20Challenge Starting a https://t.co/iuIBmFBuLN petition to have Kiran Navgire opening for India, at least in T20s. üôèüèºStriking at over 200, taking on pace, spin everything... what an elite approach. üì∏ Pankaj Nangia / Sportzpics for IPL pic.twitter.com/9IRXIlWqYC‚Äî Samreen (@SamreenRazz) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET!  11.5: Deepti Sharma 2(3) ct Smriti Mandhana b Rajeshwari Gayakwad Well, well, are we in for a little twist here. Captain SM18 just about hangs on at midwicket and Captain Deepti is out.  Velocity 116/4
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    ICYMI - Cracking start on debut - KP Navgire gets off the mark with a massive SIX!üìΩÔ∏èüìΩÔ∏èhttps://t.co/OEve84bkZL #VELvTBL #My11CircleWT20C‚Äî IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET! Over 10.1: Laura Wolvaardt 17 (16) ct Richa Ghosh b Poonam Yadav Trailblazers needed that desperately. Poonam Yadav has Laura Wolvaardt stumped...   ...well, actually caught behind as the check for stumping reveals. LW beaten by the complete lack of pace. Velocity 105/3
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 105/2 after 10 overs: A four each for Wolvaardt and Navgire off Reddy‚Äôs over. The partnership goes to 55 off 21 as Jemimah, the safest of fielders, misfields at deep midwicket. Velocity are speeding towards their target. The actual one, even. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Kiran Prabhu Navgire ‚Ä¶.Will never forget the name! Been wanting to see her play and what a privilege it is to be here to see her in action! The talent in India üáÆüá≥ is incredible! #WomensT20Challenge‚Äî Natalie Germanos üèè (@NatalieGermanos) May 26, 2022



    Shafali, Meghana, Smriti, Harman, Kiran, Richa...Backed up by Pooja and Sneh (and possibly Deepti)...How's that for a batting line-up?? ü§îüò≥‚Äî Kapil Choudhary (@kapil857) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 84/2 after 8 overs: Two fours in that Poonam Yadav in similar regions through the offside. One, the sheer power of Navgire. One, all timing from Wolvaardt. Fire and ice. Time for a timeout! This is slipping away from TBL quickly. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    I'm here for the depth in Indian women's cricket.Sabbineni Meghana. Kiran Navgire. The list goes on. I'm here for a full fledged Women's IPL.‚Äî Snehal Pradhan (@SnehalPradhan) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 71/2 after 7 overs: The classic quiet 7th over. We breathe. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Dude just clicked a selfie in the stands with the ball in hand after Kiran Navgire's 2nd six. Years down the line, could remember this moment eh? :) #WomensT20Challenge pic.twitter.com/EzcvqCfKuD‚Äî Vinayakk (@vinayakkm) May 26, 2022



    "We did a power-hitting drill and she was hitting the biggest sixes I have ever seen. She is really powerful and it‚Äôs exciting. Not so exciting for me as a South African, if I have to play against her when she is playing for India."Laura W on Kiran Nhttps://t.co/GV3vJi9JrT‚Äî Kalyani Mangale (@MangaleKalyani) May 26, 2022



    #WomensT20Challenge Kiran Navgire, remember the name üî•‚Äî Samreen (@SamreenRazz) May 26, 2022



    ‚ÄúKiran is like Shafali, a very hard hitter (of the ball). In the nets, I have seen her mostly hit sixes in the two sessions we have had. It feels like most of the balls will fly into the stands when she is batting. Will be fun to watch.‚Äùhttps://t.co/J9KBkefsz5‚Äî Sa. Gomesh | ‡Æö. ‡Æï‡Øã‡ÆÆ‡Øá‡Æ∑‡Øç (@theumpires_call) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 68/0 after 6 overs: KIRAN NAVGIRE IS HERE, FOLKS! What a start she has made. First impressions and all that. 6 to start the over, and then 4 and 6 at the end of the over off one of the senior most bowlers in world cricket, Salma Khatun. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    That sound of the batüíâüíâüíâüíâ‚Äî AshwiniüáÆüá≥ #WT20C (KP Navgire STAN) (@AshuCric07) May 26, 2022



    First ball she faces... SIX. The sound that made, uff! #WomensT20Challenge https://t.co/yUHt8oIAoA pic.twitter.com/ibdbU7SqSC‚Äî Vinayakk (@vinayakkm) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    4.6: Shafali Verma 29(15) lbw Rajeshwari Gayakwad 4-0-4-4-OUT!  Shafali Verma goes after Rajeshwari Gayakwad... but the Indian senior spinner strikes back! Super cameo by Shafali but over too soon for Velocity‚Äôs sake. Velocity 50/2
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Not for the first time season, Kiran Navgire enters the field to bat. For the first time this season, on our screens.  
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET! Over 3.6: Yastika Bhatia 19(15) b Salma Khatun Salma‚Äôs celebrations says it all. Yastika comes down the track and is beaten on length. All the experience on show by the veteran bowler there. Velocity 36/1 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #WomensT20Challenge #IPL2022I love how the ‚ÄòTake that, selectors‚Äô is a practice just so routine in Indian cricket. Doesn‚Äôt matter if it‚Äôs the men‚Äôs cricket or the women‚Äôs, it‚Äôs a mess regardless. ü•≤ https://t.co/il7R22PxC4‚Äî Samreen (@SamreenRazz) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 32/0 after 3 overs: The boundaries keep coming! One each for Yastika and Shafali in that Renuka over. One really good take by keeper RichaG too. The camera goes to the dugout... Kiran Navgire is padded up. Could be in next. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 22/0 after 2 overs: Expensive over from Matthews too. A boundary down the ground for Shafali. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Velocity getting off to a flyer!!‚Äî Kartik O üèè‚öΩüîó (@KOCricket528) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Velocity 11/0 after 1 over: Couple of fours for Yastika off Renuka‚Äôs first over. One unfortunate bounce off the turf for the mid-off fielder, the other timed nicely over mid-on.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Yastika Bhatia opening with Shafali Verma today for Velocity. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    For her excellent knock of 73 off 47 deliveries, S Meghana is our Top Performer from the first innings.A look at her batting summary here üëáüëá#VELvTBL #My11CircleWT20C pic.twitter.com/KPXaPhzbzV‚Äî IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) May 26, 2022



    #WomensT20ChallengeTrailblazers score 190/5 üî•Target for Velocity: 159 to qualify for final on NRR, 191 to win the matchhttps://t.co/4Y7eVdVMme pic.twitter.com/ZeIedR8Gpr‚Äî Vinayakk (@vinayakkm) May 26, 2022



    If you told me at the start of the innings that the two batters who had very few opportunities in the last couple of years will lead the show and take centre stage, I'd have taken it with both hands!  Really happy for Meghana and Jemimah. #WomensT20Challenge‚Äî Sa. Gomesh | ‡Æö. ‡Æï‡Øã‡ÆÆ‡Øá‡Æ∑‡Øç (@theumpires_call) May 26, 2022



    150+ totals in W T20 Challenge:Previous seasons - 0 in 18 inningsThis season - 4 in 5 innings#WomensT20Challenge‚Äî Kausthub Gudipati (@kaustats) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Meghana, Jemimah had already set the tone for their team but handy cameos by Matthews and Dunkley ensured Trailblazers finish with a huge first innings total. Some missed catches and some sloppy fielding saw Velocity‚Äôs troubles doubled.It‚Äôs the highest ever total in the Women‚Äôs T20 Challenge, so a big chase coming up...
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 190/5 after 20 overs: Simran Bahadur bowls a great last over. Ends with 2 wickets. Dunkey‚Äôs skill and experience came in handy with the two boundaries in the first two balls before Simrah dismissed her. It was followed by the wicket of Matthews who was caught by Chantham at short third man. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET!  19.6: Hayley Matthews 27(16) ct Natthakan Chantham b Simran BahadurThat‚Äôs a great comeback from the bowler to end the innings after the boundaries in the over.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET!  19.4 Sophia Dunkley 19(8) ct Radha Yadav b Simran BahadurA brilliant running catch from Radha to dismiss the dangerous Dunkley!
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Superb knock that from Jemimah Rodrigues. Looked at ease against spin and pace. And liked how she used the cut shot. Big stage, team in trouble, just the kind of knock needed. And i liked how her mother had one of the biggest cheers after her half-century. #VELvTBL #WT20Challenge‚Äî S. Sudarshanan (@Sudarshanan7) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 179/3 after 19 overs: Not the kind of penultimate over Velocity would have wanted. Sneh Rana having a rather odd day. Matthews carts her for two back-to-back boundaries. 11 runs off it.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 168/3 after 18 overs: Dunkley time! Could prove to be just the right time for her to come in as her hitting skills are on display with that six over midwicket.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #WomensT20ChallengeEnd of a fine, fine innings by Jemimah Rodrigues! Had a couple of reprieves, but Sneh Rana hangs on this time. Khaka with the wicket. But some wonderful shots in that 44-ball 66. üëäTBL: 157/3 (17)#VELvTBL live blog: https://t.co/uo0Sg7yA6S pic.twitter.com/0l32zDGOYU‚Äî The Field (@thefield_in) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 157/3 after 17 overs: Khaka gets the breakthrough. Almost as if she just had to compensate for the drop earlier. Jemimah departs after a well-made 66. Sophia Dunkley the next batter in.WICKET!  16.6 Jemimah Rodrigues 66(44) ct Sneh Rana b Ayabonga Khaka
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    What is going on with the fielding ü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è #Velocity making it extra hard for themselves!!‚Äî Lisa Sthalekar (@sthalekar93) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 144/2 after 16 overs: That‚Äôs an eventful over! Simran hasn‚Äôt really bowled badly at all but there have been two sloppy drops. Sneh Rana involved in another drop. Jemimah with a beautiful slogsweep for six earlier. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #WomensT20Challenge‚òëÔ∏è 100-run partnership between Jemimah Rodrigues & S Meghana‚òëÔ∏è Half century Jemimah Rodrigues (How good is it see her in such form?)‚òëÔ∏è Sneh Rana dismisses S Meghana for a fine 73. Eventful.TBL: 128/2 (15)#VELvTBL live blog: https://t.co/uo0Sg7yA6S pic.twitter.com/SFwyj1tfKP‚Äî The Field (@thefield_in) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 128/2 after 15 overs: Sneh Rana gets the important breakthrough but it‚Äôs still 12 runs off it. Hayley Matthews is the next batter in.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    WICKET!  14.3 S Meghana 73(47) ct Kate Cross b Sneh RanaA brilliant innings comes to an end! She was just changing gears, having scored a six and four before this. That‚Äôs a job done well. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 116/1 after 14 overs: FIFTY! Jemimah Rodrigues also brings up her half-century, off 36 deliveries. That was a great over by Simran Bahadur. An opportunity missed as Meghana was dropped by Khaka. But just 4 runs off it. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    "OK Google, these two batters seem to be batting so well. Were any of them in India's recent #CWC22 squad?"ü•≤#WomensT20Challenge pic.twitter.com/c5g1cSVp59‚Äî Vinayakk (@vinayakkm) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 112/1 after 12 overs: The ease with which Meghana lofted that six over the bowler‚Äôs head in the first delivery of the over... brilliant! 100 comes up for Trailblazers and the partnership‚Äôs going steady. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 99/1 after 12 overs: 7 runs off Khaka‚Äôs over. The quieter middle overs? Velocity would appreciate that. Or it could just be time to change gears for the two. In any case, it‚Äôs about to get fun.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Thailand national team cricketers in the house. In attendance at the MCA Stadium to cheer team-mate Natthakan Chantham and Velocity on.#WT20C | #WomensT20Challenge‚Äî Annesha Ghosh (@ghosh_annesha) May 26, 2022



    Oh, my word! Shafali Verma has certainly raised her fielding levels. And i am liking what I‚Äôm seeing of her with the ball. Bodes well for Indian cricket. #VELvTBL #WT20Challenge‚Äî S. Sudarshanan (@Sudarshanan7) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 92/1 after 11 overs: Some change in tactics as Shafali Verma bowls this one. Velocity are looking to break the partnership. No wicket off it but it‚Äôs been economical, considering how the runs are flowing. 6 runs off it.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    S Meghana was not part of India's World Cup squad. What a brilliant half century! #JustSaying #WomensT20Challenge #MaggieIsMagic‚Äî Kalyani Mangale (@MangaleKalyani) May 26, 2022



    #WomensT20ChallengeHalf century for S Meghana! Off just 32 balls. Remember her knocks in New Zealand for India? Well, we saw it again today why she has been so good at the top of the order. A wonderful intent-filled knock so far. #VELvTBL live blog: https://t.co/uo0Sg7yA6S pic.twitter.com/qpqmSTDc2q‚Äî The Field (@thefield_in) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 86/1 after 10 overs: FIFTY! Meghana brings up her half-century in 32 balls. A simple raise of the bat and the Trailblazers dug-out stands up in appreciation. Easy, peasy for the opener. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Oooof Meghana! Whacked it behind the sight screen! Crowd is ecstatic. #WomensT20Challenge #WT20C‚Äî Lavanya üéôÔ∏èüé•üë©üèª‚Äçüíª (@lav_narayanan) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 79/1 after 9 overs: Wow! The highlight of that over has to be Meghana smoking a six over Radha‚Äôs head. Jemimah also laces it a four. A free-hit earlier but just one run off it. A total 15 runs scored off that over. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    A fine 50-run partnership comes up between S Meghana and Jemimah.Live - https://t.co/FLFvj1HDlk #VELvTBL #My11CircleWT20C pic.twitter.com/zvfPCEvJoB‚Äî IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) May 26, 2022



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Trailblazers 64/1 after 8 overs: Jemimah seems to have slowed down a tad bit but Meghana is making up for it, she‚Äôs currently batting at over a SR of over 160. 9 runs off the Sneh Rana over.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Batter stepping out against a left arm spinner to hit an inside out shot is a such a sight to behold.üòç#WomensT20Challenge‚Äî siddhi (@_sectumsempra18) May 26, 2022
